text: Najeeb Tarakai (2 February 1991 â€“ 6 October 2020) was an Afghan cricketer. He played international cricket for the Afghanistan national team. He also played domestic cricket for the Afghan Cheetahs and Twenty20 cricket for the Nangarhar Leopards. On 2 October 2020, Tarakai was hit by a car while crossing a road in Jalalabad, Nangarhar. He suffered a head injury and was left in a coma. He died four days later at the age of 29. ==References== ==Other websites== *Najeeb Tarakai at ESPNcricinfo Category:1991 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Afghan cricketers Category:Road accident deaths Category:21st- century Afghan people
title: Najeeb Tarakai
